channel.title: Blogs on Travis Waelbroeck
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Travis Waelbroeck

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome! I’m not sure why you’re here, but if you want to read about things I find interesting, then stick around! I’m an Application Engineer at Blue Stingray, a software company in St. Louis, MO. I’ve been working on Odoo projects for about 3 years at this point, which is written in Python and XML. I’ve used Sublime Text most of my career, but I switched to Neovim full time earlier this year and I’m not looking back.
